name: Restaurant Reservation System
description: Application built for restaurant employees which allows them to create, edit, seat, cancel and keep track of reservations during their shift.

alt: picture of a movies, and movie reviews application
name: We Love Movies - Movies, Theaters and Reviews
description: A 'Mock' Movie application that shows current movies in theaters, lists all theaters and movies playing at those theaters, and displays information for all movies.

name: Flashcard Study App
description: This application lets you create decks of flashcards for studying. Customize and create cards, then use them for studying for that upcoming exam!

name: GrubDash
description: Built the backend API/server for this application using RESTful architecture. Desgined routes to provide fast an accurate data to the user-end.
